introduction: 一部表现当代青年精神困境的实验短片，讲述了一个企图通过考研走上电影道路的落魄年轻人参加考研复习前后身边发生的一系列事件以及他的幻想，在这些虚与实的背后隐藏着更多关于他的秘密。This is an absurd drama that expresses the spiritual world of contemporary college students. It tells a series of bizarre events that happened to a young man who tried to go to the film path through postgraduate entrance examination before and after the postgraduate entrance examination. Behind these bizarre stories, there are more secrets about him.
